name: EMediaVidPro
summary: EMediaViD a stand alone html5 video presentation
short_description: XMediaVidPro is a stand alone html5 & css3 javascript software designed to bring all the functions of being able to present a video to the mass populations of artistic visions in the world weather it be video or photography. we would like to bring this software into the public eye and open up new features for everyone to enjoy.
